name: INVISIBLE STALKER

traits.name: Air Form
traits.text: The stalker can enter an enemy's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so.

traits.name: Invisibility
traits.text: The stalker has the Invisible condition.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The stalker makes three Wind Swipe attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Vortex.

actions.name: Wind Swipe
actions.text: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) Force damage.

actions.name: Vortex
actions.text: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 14, one Large or smaller creature in the stalker's space. Failure: 7 (1d8 + 3) Thunder damage, and the target has the Grappled condition (escape DC 13). Until the grapple ends, the target can't cast spells with a Verbal component and takes 7 (2d6) Thunder damage at the start of each of the stalker's turns. As detectives, we seek truth by eliminating the impossible, ever mindful that the impossible might also be seeking to eliminate us. -
